Doctor.title: Select someone to heal!
description:
**You clutch your first aid kit and adjust your cap, ready to face the horrors of war ...** 
 
You can pick someone to heal and **grant them Powerful Defense** for the night. 
You can heal any other person multiple times, except **yourself**. You can only self-heal **once**. 
You will visit the target you choose to heal. If you self-heal, you will stay home. 
 
*If you do not choose a target, you will stay home.*

Investigator.title: Select someone to investigate!
description:
**You don your hat and your magnifying glass, preparing to throw away your morals ...** 
 
You can pick someone to investigate and **receive a clue to their role**. 
You will receive **four to five** different roles that your target **could** be. 
Some roles, like the Framer, Hex Master, and Arsonist, may give you incorrect results. 
 
*If you do not choose a target, you will stay home and will not receive any results.*

Mafioso.title: Select someone to attack!
description:
**You pick up your gun, its metallic barrel shining under a single dim lamplight ...** 
 
You can vote to shoot someone each night, dealing a **Basic** attack. 
If your target is **too strong to kill**, then you will be notified in your house chat. 
If there is a **Godfather** in the game, then you will attack whoever **they choose**. 
 
*If you nor the Godfather select a player, then you will stay home and will not attack.*

Sheriff.title: Select someone to investigate!
description:
**You look at your badge on your nightstand. You'll find the evil in this town ...** 
 
You will visit someone's house and interrogate them to see if they are good or evil. 
You will be notified in your house chat if your target is innocent or guilty. 
Note that roles like the Framer, Godfather, and Vampire may obscure or reverse these results. 
 
*If you do not choose a target, you will stay home and will not receive any results.*
